title: What are the limits of fair use when it comes to clips from movies, TV shows, and music? - Quora
tags: Legal Issues and Law in Everyday Life

response.answer_text: Try seeing the examples here: What are some examples of fair use? Your final product must feature NEW content which discusses the borrowed content. That new stuff must be the mostc”substantial” part of your video. “Minimal use” means you should never use a full scene. Also your intent to declare your video “fair use” does not block the rights of the original content owner to sue you or file a claim.
